What about data fetching? So, how does
how does that work when you're building
a Nox app? Yeah. So, if you want to

built-in composible called use fetch. So
for any endpoint you define inside of

available and it gives you type
completion as to what the return type is
as well. But one of the beautiful things
about usefetch is it's right. It runs
both on the client side and on the

code runs on the server, that's going to
server side render the page. If you

side navigation, that request to the API
will actually happen on the client side.
And uh Nux is smart enough because of
Nitro to see that if a request is

invokes that function directly in your
backend. So your API routes can actually
call each other, but it's not it's not
like doing a network hop. It literally
figures out, oh, I'm already running on
the server, so I can actually just
invoke that other API function. So,
